de.wwu.muggl.vm.execution
Class NativeWrapper

java.lang.Object
  de.wwu.muggl.vm.execution.NativeWrapper

public class NativeWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the functionality to wrap native methods calls. It therefore offers several means of processing native methods.

Methods from the java-package can be forwarded to the java virtual machine that Muggl runs on. For some native methods special wrapper classes can be snapped-in.

The wrapping process does currently not check accessibility beside the normal accessibility check done by the invocation instructions. Whenever possible, access is forced to be granted. Not forcing access will not work in common, since many native methods have package or even private visibility only; still the reflection objects are invoked by this wrapper and not by the original class. This bridge from the "world" of this application and its virtual machine would lead to problems, if accessed was not forced.

In case of invalid class files or recompilation of just a couple of files of a projects, where the visibility of classes or methods has been changed, might lead to a behavior that does not reflect the behavior the virtual machine of sun would show. However, this is unlikely.

In future releases, a dedicated access right checking could be added to this wrapper.

Version:
1.0.0, 2010-03-10
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

Method Detail

forwardNativeInvocation

public static void forwardNativeInvocation(Frame frame,
                                           Method method,
                                           ClassFile methodClassFile,
                                           Objectref invokingObjectref,
                                           java.lang.Object[] parameters)
                                    throws ForwardingUnsuccessfulException,
                                           VmRuntimeException
Forward the method to its native implementation in the java-package or to a special wrapper class.

Parameters:
frame - The currently executed frame.
method - The method to forward.
methodClassFile - The methods' ClassFile.
invokingObjectref - The object reference invoking the method. Should be null for static method calls.
parameters - The parameters for the invocation of the method.
Throws:
ForwardingUnsuccessfulException - If forwarding fails.
VmRuntimeException - If the invoked method throws an exception (which is a valid result of the invocation).

forwardToACustomWrapper

public static java.lang.Object forwardToACustomWrapper(Method method,
                                                       ClassFile methodClassFile,
                                                       java.lang.Object[] parameters,
                                                       Objectref objectref)
                                                throws ForwardingUnsuccessfulException
Forward the invocation of a native method to a customer wrapper provided by this virtual machine implementation.

Parameters:
method - The method to forward.
methodClassFile - The methods' ClassFile.
parameters - The parameters for the invocation of the method.
objectref - The object reference of the invoking method. Be sure not to confuse it with the object reference passed to any invocation instruction but invokestatic.
Returns:
The Object returned by the custom wrapper.
Throws:
ForwardingUnsuccessfulException - If forwarding fails.
